cleaned_text: Senator Elizabeth Warren: Vaccines are safe, effective & protect our children Senator Elizabeth Warren's Q&A at a Senate HELP Committee hearing on February 10, 2015 titled, "The Reemergence of Vaccine-Preventable Diseases: Exploring the Public Health Successes and Challenges."
